label: conditionCode
comment: A code specifying a condition of this logistics packaging.
A code specifying the condition of this supply chain packaging.
The code specifying this inspection status condition.

domainIncludes.comment: The information relevant to a condition related to an inspection.
Any wrapping or containment, such as a box or a barrel, whether or not any goods are contained within.
Any material with which supply chain goods are packaged, such as a box or bubble wrap.
